name: NFTFactory
description: {ERC721} token factory ("NFTFactory"), including: - ability for holders to burn (destroy) their tokens - an admin role that allows for role management - a minter role that allows for token minting (creation).

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: Base account (owner[0]) starts with admin and minter role; others, NFT grants.

parameterDecorators.name: baseURI
parameterDecorators.description: The base URI metadata for NFT.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: The `tokenId` for initial NFT minted to owner(s).

parameterDecorators.name: tokenURI
parameterDecorators.description: The `tokenURI` for initial NFT minted to owner(s). Requirements: - array lengths must match.

functionDecorators.name: getNFTByAddress
functionDecorators.description: owner is the base owner of the NFT.
